participant_2.background:
I am not going to go the extra mile anymore.
I wish my boyfriend did not want an open relationship.
I want to get married again.
I have 10 years experience in our industry , yet she gets promoted.
I am angry at my coworker.

content.text: Hey, I'm participant_1, how are you doing today?
I'm doing okay, I'm just a little angry at my coworker.
She got promoted over me, even though I have 10 years of experience in our industry.
That's really unfair! I know how you feel. I once worked for a magazine and my coworker got promoted over me too.
I'm just not going to go the extra mile anymore. I'm not going to let her take advantage of me.
That's a good idea. You don't need to put up with that.
Thanks. I'm just so angry right now.
I understand. I would be too.
I'm also not happy with my boyfriend. He wants an open relationship and I don't want that.
Oh, that's tough. I'm sorry to hear that.
Thanks. I don't know what to do.
Well, you could talk to him about it and see if you can come to an agreement.
I've tried, but he doesn't seem to be willing to listen.
That's tough. I'm not sure what else to suggest.
Thanks for listening. I really appreciate it.
No problem. I'm always here for you.
